Geography: Country of Origin Egypt, Middle Egypt, el-Amarna (Akhetaten); inc. el-Hagg Qandil, Private houses in the town, Petrie/Carter 1891–1892
Provenance: Petrie excavations 1891–1892. Acquired by Petrie in the division of finds. Acquired by Lord Amherst for his support. Purchased by the Museum at the Amherst Sale, Sotheby's, 1921.
